TComplexImage Struct Reference
[Class ComplexImage]

An image containing real and imaginary pixels of type FLOAT32. More...

#include <c_kernel_functions.h>

FLOAT32 * pPixelStreamIm
FLOAT32 ** ppAllScanLinesRe
FLOAT32 ** ppAllScanLinesIm

Detailed Description

An image containing real and imaginary pixels of type FLOAT32.

Always remember to call kC_InitComplexImage() after creating a variable of this type.

See also:
TFileInfo

Definition at line 48 of file c_kernel_functions.h.
